Title: Authorizes the commissioner of education to appoint a monitor to oversee the Mount Vernon city school district; repealer
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of education to appoint a monitor to oversee the Mount Vernon city school district; establishes the powers and duties of such monitor.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the commissioner of education to appoint a monitor to oversee the Mount Vernon city school district and establishing the powers and duties of such monitor; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
